metaTags.title: Zenith Aerospace || Aerospace Technology || EESC-USP
metaTags.description: Since 2014, Zenith Aerospace has been dedicated to the construction of CubeSats and Space Probes as an extracurricular from USP. Come and meet us!

homePageHero.title: HOME OF THE STARS IN SÃO CARLOS
homePageHero.subtitle: Since 2014, Zenith Aerospace provides hundred of students with the opportunity to reach space

homePageDepartaments.title: Building aerospace technology in all sectors
homePageDepartaments.subtitle: We design and build our own products, from the mission conception to hardware and structure manufacture

embarcados.title: Embedded Systems
embarcados.detail: This department researches and develops embedded system technologies related to aerospace applications

cores.title: Hardware:
cores.detail: Circuit board development for aerospace applications and their manufacture.

cores.title: Low Level:
cores.detail: Microcontroller programming related to multiple embedded system projects.

cores.title: High Level:
cores.detail: Development of web, mobile and desktop aplications for mission support.

estruturas.title: Structures
estruturas.detail: This department develops probes and CubeSats 3D models for their manufacturing. They also project supports for the embedded systems.

cores.title: Structure Development:
cores.detail: Development of the structure's CAD 3D model.

cores.title: Vibration Attenuation :
cores.detail: Responsible for tests and simulations to make sure that the modeled structure supports the vibrations.

cores.title: Thermal Insulation :
cores.detail: Development of the structure's complete thermal model, making sure it is in the correct working temperature.

astrobiologia.title: Astrobiology
astrobiologia.detail: This department develops biological experiments, aiming to expose those experiments to space-like environmental conditions.

cores.title: Kurumin Project support:
cores.detail: Selecting and manipulating Kurumin's educational experiments that will be attached to the stratospheric probes.

cores.title: Scientific:
cores.detail: Conducting experiments which can lead to the publication of scientific papers

cores.title: Partnerships:
cores.detail: Providing needed technical and operational support to researchers interested in attaching experiments to vehicles made by Zenith

gestao.title: Management
gestao.detail: This department is responsible for organizing and administrating the group.

cores.title: Finances:
cores.detail: Budget and expenses control, responsible for looking for and maintaining sponsorships.

cores.title: Marketing:
cores.detail: Social network management, planning strategies to attract new partners and make the group known.

cores.title: Human Resources:
cores.detail: Group members management, analyzing their performance and satisfaction.

cores.title: Events:
cores.detail: Promoting interactions between the Group and society throught educational events, such as 'Sábado Aeroespacial'.

astronautica.title: Astronautics
astronautica.detail: This department is responsible for researching and developing the needed tools for exploring the limits of Earth's atmosphere, as well as executing said 'exploration'.

cores.title: Flight dynamics:
cores.detail: Fligh simulations, providing information regarding static stability and balloon dynamics which are used for planning launch strategies and probe recovery.

cores.title: Research & Development:
cores.detail: Researchs in the fields of fluid dynamics and orbital mechanics, which are important for finding ways of applying theoretical models in Zenith's future missions.

cores.title: Legislation:
cores.detail: Responsible for the normative part of the missions with stratospheric balloons, always in accordance to the Brazilian airspace rules.

genus.title: Genus
genus.detail: Modularized hardware to be used in aerospace applications

homePageSupporters.title: Our supporters
homePageSupporters.detail: without them, nothing would be possible

footer.easterEgg: MADE WITH TONS OF JAVASCRIPT AND CONFUSION ON DISCORD
